item.title: Create CSV file from Google Spreadsheet
item.description: Hello! It is very easy to create a CSV file from data in a Google spreadsheet using Google Apps Script. I have written this code for creating CSV file with email IDs to import in Google groups as it is very difficult to copy paste the emails IDs manually. 1. Open your spreadsheet that contains the data 2. Open the script editor. Tools -> Script Editor 3. Copy and paste the below code to the script editor and save the script with a name.
